official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to transfer to the Goshen Irrigation District, Wyoming, certain lands and irrigation structures relating to the Fort Laramie Division of the North Platte Project.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to transfer to the Goshen Irrigation District, Wyoming, certain lands and irrigation structures relating to the Fort Laramie Division of the North Platte Project, subject to specified requirements.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to transfer to the Goshen Irrigation District, Wyoming, certain lands and irrigation structures relating to the Fort Laramie Division of the North Platte Project.
